Package metro.repository

Interface MetroRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
MetroRepositoryJson
public interface MetroRepository
Defines operations on the subway map.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void

    Adds a new station at the beginning of the metro line

  • Method Details

    • findLine

      Deque<Station> findLine(String line)
      Finds a metro line by its name
      Parameters:
      line - - the name of metro line
      Returns:
      list of metro stations for the given metro line.

    • addHead

      void addHead(String line, String station, int time)
      Adds a new station at the beginning of the metro line
      Parameters:
      line - - the name of metro line
      station - - the name of new metro station
      time - - travel time to the next metro station
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if there is no such metro line

    • append

      void append(String line, String station, int time)
      Adds a new station at the end of the metro line
      Parameters:
      line - - the name of metro line
      station - - the name of new metro station
      time - - travel time to the next metro station
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if there is no such metro line

    • remove

      void remove(String line, String station)
      Removes a station from the metro map.
      Parameters:
      line - - the name of metro line
      station - - the name of metro station to remove

    • connect

      void connect(String sourceLine, String sourceStation, String targetLine, String targetStation)
      Adds a transfer connection between two metro stations.
      Parameters:
      sourceLine - - the name of the first metro line
      sourceStation - - the name of the first metro station
      targetLine - - the name of the second metro line
      targetStation - - the name of the second metro station
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if there is no such metro line or station

    • getGraph

      Graph<StationId> getGraph()
      Creates a direct weighted graph based on the metro map.
      Returns:
      a direct weighted graph with StationId as vertexes

    • getSchema

      Map<String,Deque<Station>> getSchema()
      Returns metro schema
      Returns:
      the schema of the metro

    • getMetroName

      String getMetroName()
      Returns name of the metro
      Returns:
      metro name
